about_the_game:
"Michi: Depths of the Forest" is the exciting expansion pack to the strategic deck-building auto battler game Michi. In this pack, you will continue your journey through the challenging floors of the monster tower, facing even tougher opponents and new challenges.

The expansion pack introduces a range of new monsters and Aibos to the game, adding even more depth and variety to your pool of monsters. The new monsters have unique abilities and traits, allowing you to build even more powerful and interesting combinations of Aibos.

You'll also encounter new obstacles and challenges on each floor, forcing you to adapt and rethink your strategies. The enemy AI teams are stronger and more cunning, testing your skills to the limit.

With new levels to explore, new monsters to collect, and new challenges to overcome, Michi: Levels 2-10 is the perfect addition to the game for players looking for even more depth and excitement. So join the adventure and see if you have what it takes to conquer the monster tower!

  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz

  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
